dcterms:creator: Yu-Gang Jiang
Yudong Jiang
Jiajun Wang
dcterms:description: The VCDB dataset contains 100,528 videos, with 528 queries and 6,139 manually annotated as positive retrieval samples. It was initially used for partial copy detection in videos, and then also widely used to evaluate the performance of video retrieval models.
dcterms:title: VCDB

dcterms:creator: Qing-Yuan Jiang
Yi He
Gen Li
Jian Lin
Lei Li
Wu-Jun Li
dcterms:description: The SVD dataset is introduced for large-scale short video retrieval, which contains 562,013 short videos from Douyin (TikTok China). It contains 1,206 queries and 34,020 labeled videos, of which 10,211 are positive retrieval samples and 26,927 are negative.
dcterms:title: SVD
